com.danielly.jsf.cinema.checkout

Class Checkout

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.danielly.jsf.cinema.checkout.Checkout
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    @Named
 @FlowScoped(value="checkout")
public class Checkout
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    The Class Checkout is in charge of the checkout process. Starting with the purchase request, the validation and the necessary checks and finishing with completing the order, issuing the tickets and updating the database.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Gil Danielly
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • fulfillOrder

        public void fulfillOrder()
        FulfillOrder is being used to validate and to check the requirements needed and finish with creating the order. The method check the tickets and seats availability if allocated, the payment details and updating the database. In case of a failure with one o the database processes the database will perform rollback and the user will be notified.

      • checkSeatAndTicket

        public boolean checkSeatAndTicket()
        Check that there are available tickets for the showtime and the seats availability if the seats are allocated and .
        Returns:
        true, if successful

      • createOrderObjectAndUpdateDB

        private boolean createOrderObjectAndUpdateDB()
        Creates the order object and insert the database.
        Returns:
        true, if successful

      • updateTicketAndShowtimeTablesInDb

        private boolean updateTicketAndShowtimeTablesInDb()
        Update the tickets and showtimes tables in the database. These are the tables that are going to be updated: 1. tickets 2. showtimes 3. showtimes_seats - in case the seats are allocated\assigned 4. tickets_seat - in case the seats are allocated\assigned
        Returns:
        true, if successful

      • updateNewTicketsAttributes

        private void updateNewTicketsAttributes()
        Update the new tickets attributes in the class level. Can be used for one or more tickets.

      • decrementAvailableTicket

        public boolean decrementAvailableTicket(int showtimeId)
        Decrement the number of available tickets.
        Parameters:
        showtimeId - the showtime id
        Returns:
        true, if successful

      • updateDbIfSeatIsAllocted

        private boolean updateDbIfSeatIsAllocted(int seatId,
                                         int newTempTicketId)
        Update the database if the seat is allocated\assigned.
        Parameters:
        seatId - the seat id
        newTempTicketId - the new temporary ticket id
        Returns:
        true, if successful

      • rollbackTicketAndShowtimeTablesInDb

        private boolean rollbackTicketAndShowtimeTablesInDb()
        Rollback tickets and showtimes tables in the database. Will be used in case of a failure to complete the order. These are the tables that are going to be rollback: 1. tickets 2. showtimes 3. showtimes_seats - in case the seats are allocated\assigned 4. tickets_seat - in case the seats are allocated\assigned
        Returns:
        true, if successful

      • rollbackShowtimeSeats

        private boolean rollbackShowtimeSeats()
        Rollback the database table showtimes_seats if the seats are allocated\assigned. Will be used in case of a failure to complete the order.
        Returns:
        true, if successful

      • rollbackDbTicketsSeats

        private boolean rollbackDbTicketsSeats(int newTicketToRollback)
        Rollback the database table tickets_seats if the seats are allocated\assigned. Will be used in case of a failure to complete the order.
        Parameters:
        newTicketToRollback - the new ticket to rollback
        Returns:
        true, if successful

      • isTicketSeatCheckSuccess

        public boolean isTicketSeatCheckSuccess()
        Checks if is ticket seat check was success. This method is being used in the CheckoutFlow to navigate to seating-failure.xhtml page in case of a false.
        Returns:
        true, if is ticket seat check success

      • isGeneralOrderIssueFailure

        public boolean isGeneralOrderIssueFailure()
        Checks if is general order issue failure. This method is being used in the CheckoutFlow to navigate to order-failure.xhtml page in case of a false.
        Returns:
        true, if is general order issue failure
